pages.text: $(li)The Void Worm is a very dangerous creature composed of the result of introducing the power of the void into a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larva$(/l).$(br)$(li)This creature can shoot you with green homing crystals.$(br)$(li)It can also ram you or even knocking you back a large distance, lauching you in the air.$(br)$(li)

$(li)This creature is able to control the space, creating portals that allow it to teleporting between two points.$(br)$(li)You or any other creature can be teleported by these portals too.$(br)$(li)It drops two $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/void_worm_mandible)Void Worm Mandibles$(/l) and one $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/void_worm_eye)Void Worm Eye$(/l) upon death.$(br)$(li)These items don't have gravity, so you will have to figure out how reach them.
